metadata.name: She Rode Endless Waves...
metadata.description:
Digitized handmade paper collage. Image of a woman riding a wave into the sunset with the words "She rode endless waves with talent, speed and astounding beauty." Captures the poetry and elegance of surfing.

A natural adventurer with a rebellious spirit, Naomi (Olson) AKA Boundless Wave/Sea Is Medicine, uses mantras, affirmations and wordplay to elevate her collage and photographic images. Her work is poetic, ethereal, and invokes the senses as she explores the human spirit, natural intelligence, and the beauty of this world. She has exhibited photos in NY, Hawaii, and France. Her love of the ocean and it's mystery blend with her passion for the esoteric to inform her work.
